APP_ENV.description: Laravel environment mode. Unless developing the application, this should be production.

APP_DEBUG.description: Laravel debug mode. Unless developing the application or actively debugging a problem, this should be set to false.

APP_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies. (See either https://snipe-it.readme.io/docs/generate-your-app-key or generate at https://coderstoolbox.online/toolbox/generate-symfony-secret)

APP_URL.description: URL where your Snipe-IT install will be available at.

APP_TIMEZONE.description: Which timezone do you want to use for your install? (http://php.net/manual/en/timezones.php)

APP_LOCALE.description: Which language do you want to use for your install? (https://snipe-it.readme.io/docs/configuration#setting-a-language)

MAX_RESULTS.description: The maximum number of search results that can be returned at one time.

MAIL_MAILER.description: Mail driver - Generally SMTP on Heroku - https://snipe-it.readme.io/docs/configuration#required-outgoing-mail-settings

MAIL_TLS_VERIFY_PEER.description: Ensure validity of TLS certificate on remote mail server

MAIL_AUTO_EMBED.description: Whether or not to embed images in emails (via CID or base64) versus linking to them.

MAIL_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD.description: Method that should be used for attaching inline images.

SESSION_LIFETIME.description: Specify the time in minutes that the session should remain valid.

EXPIRE_ON_CLOSE.description: Specify whether or not the logged in session should be expired when the user closes their browser window.

ENCRYPT.description: Specify whether you wish to use encrypted cookies for your Snipe-IT sessions.

COOKIE_NAME.description: The name of the cookie set by Snipe-IT for session management.

COOKIE_DOMAIN.description: The domain name that the session cookie should be sent for.

SECURE_COOKIES.description: Should cookies only be sent for HTTPS connections? Generally true on Heroku.

LOGIN_MAX_ATTEMPTS.description: The maximum number of failed attempts allowed before the user is throttled.

LOGIN_LOCKOUT_DURATION.description: The duration (in seconds) that the user should be blocked from attempting to authenticate again.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Driver to send logs to. (errorlog for stderr)

ALLOW_IFRAMING.description: Allow Snipe-IT to be loaded using an iFrame?

GOOGLE_MAPS_API.description: Include your Google Maps API key here if you'd like Snipe-IT to load maps from Google on your locations and suppliers pages.

BACKUP_ENV.description: Set this to true if you wish to backup your .env file in your Admin > Backups process.

ENABLE_HSTS.description: Whether or not to send the HSTS security policy header.
